Plot: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.
Title: The Four Feathers
Writer: A.E.W. Mason (novel), Michael Schiffer (screenplay), Hossein Amini (screenplay)
Actors: Wes Bentley, Mohamed Bouich, Campbell Brown, Daniel Caltagirone
tomatoConsensus: Though beautiful to look at, The Four Feathers lacks epic excitement and suffers from an ambivalent viewpoint.
